message: Let's start with a fair deal. I'll take the lion's share this time, but we can adjust things in the next round if you're not happy.
Let's be reasonable, Alice. This offer gives us both a good chunk of the money.
Let's find a middle ground. I'm willing to give up some of my share from the last round, but I still need a fair portion. Let's work together to find a solution.
